Module edu.rpi.cs.csci4963.java.finalproject
Package edu.rpi.cs.chane5

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.cs.chane5.Utils
public class Utils extends Object
Class containing static utility methods. Not intended to be instantiated.
Version:
1.0.0

  • Field Details

    • DEBUG_MODE

      public static boolean DEBUG_MODE
      Debug mode flag, set using the program CLI args. If true it will print a lot of verbose information about the current state of the program. Otherwise, all the verbose outputs will not be displayed to the terminal.

  • Method Details

    • debug

      public static void debug(String msg)
      Prints a debug trace method if DEBUG flag is enabled.
      Outputs in the format of the caller's class and method then the message on a new line. CallerClassName █ callerMethodName @ LineNumber \n \t > msg
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to print to the console.

    • error

      public static void error(String error)
      Prints an error trace method if DEBUG flag is enabled in the color RED and a stack trace is provided.
      Outputs in the format of stack trace then the caller's class and method then the message on a new line. CallerClassName █ callerMethodName @ LineNumber \n \t > msg
      Parameters:
      error - The message to print to the console.

    • errorTrace

      public static void errorTrace(String error)
      Prints an error trace method if DEBUG flag is enabled in the color RED.
      Outputs in the format of the caller's class and method then the message on a new line. STACK_TRACE_HERE \n CallerClassName █ callerMethodName @ LineNumber \n \t > msg
      Parameters:
      error - The message to print to the console.

    • alertError

      public static void alertError(String header, String msg, Consumer<? super javafx.scene.control.ButtonType> cb)
      Creates an alert popout with a header and body.
      Parameters:
      header - the general type of error
      msg - detailed information about the error
      cb - the callback function after the user presses a button

    • alertError

      public static void alertError(String header, String msg)
      Creates an alert popout with a header and body.
      Parameters:
      header - the general type of error
      msg - detailed information about the error

    • alertWarning

      public static void alertWarning(String header, String msg, Consumer<? super javafx.scene.control.ButtonType> cb)
      Creates a warning popout with a header and body.
      Parameters:
      header - the general type of error
      msg - detailed information about the error
      cb - the method to run when the OK button is pressed

    • alertConfirmation

      public static void alertConfirmation(String header, String msg, Runnable confirm, Runnable otherwise)
      Creates a confirmation popout with a header and body.
      Parameters:
      header - the general type of error
      msg - detailed information about the error
      confirm - the consumer function after the user presses OK
      otherwise - the consumer function after the user doesn't select OK, such as CANCEL or closing the window

    • alertConfirmation

      header - the general type of error
      msg - detailed information about the error
      confirm - the consumer function after the user presses OK

    • textFieldEnsurePositiveCountingNumber

      public static void textFieldEnsurePositiveCountingNumber(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField, boolean allowZero)
      Adds a listener to the JavaFX TextField to conform all inputs to be digits and not start with a leading 0. Notice negative numbers are not supported.
      Parameters:
      textField - the TextField to add this constraint to
      allowZero - enable 0 as a valid input

    • promptUserForFile

      public static File promptUserForFile(String defaultOpenLocation, javafx.stage.Stage stage, String title)
      Opens a dialog for the user to select a file.
      Parameters:
      defaultOpenLocation - staring directory to open the dialog box
      stage - the stage that is the dialog's owner
      title - the tile of the file selector window
      Returns:
      the file object of the selected file or null if not

    • promptUserForFolder

      public static File promptUserForFolder(String defaultOpenLocation, javafx.stage.Stage stage, String title)
      Opens a dialog for the user to select a folder.
      Parameters:
      defaultOpenLocation - staring directory to open the dialog box
      stage - the stage that is the dialog's owner
      title - the tile of the folder selector window
      Returns:
      the file object of the selected folder or null if not

    • fatalIfDebug

      public static void fatalIfDebug()
      Crashes the program if DEBUG_MODE is enabled.
